Actions.Name: White Strings
Actions.AreaEffect: All allies in the area are teleported 2 in any direction (the Puppeteer can choose for each character).

Actions.Name: Black Strings
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 is branded and must save. On a failed save, they teleport up to 3 spaces to the nearest ally and deal [D]+[fray] to them as an effect.

Actions.Name: Unravel
Actions.Description: A foe at 25% hp or lower must save or be instantly defeated. On a successful save, they are instead reduced to 1 hp.
